chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: In this video, I will tell you what are ID and Classes?

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: The concept of ID and Classes is one of the most confused concepts.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: In fact, when I was learning HTML, I was very confused in my early days.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: That is, if you give an ID to an element, you will not give that ID to the other element.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: But Class means that if you want to give a property to multiple elements,

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: then you will give it multiple classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: For example, you can give a class named Red to a div and a form.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Similarly, you can give a class named BGRed to an article tag and a header tag.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Do like this video because we will now go to the computer screen

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: and we will see these things very closely.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Alright guys, so I am back.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And if you have not accessed the Sigma Web Development course,

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: then access the playlist or click on the bookmark or click on save.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And the source code is also being uploaded on GitHub.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Now I will come here quickly in the folder and make a folder of video number 9.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So I will make a folder of video 9 here.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And after making a folder of video 9, I will right click on shift and open with code.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And here you can see that it has opened in BS code.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Now I will write index.html here, I will enter with an exclamation mark.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And along with that, I will tell you what are ID and classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: You must have an Aadhar card, right?

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: If not, then you must have some ID.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Now don't write in the comment that I don't have an ID.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Whenever you go somewhere, you have to show your ID

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: in some of the cases to prove your identity.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Now if you want to understand about ID and classes in HTML,

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: then ID is what your identity is.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: What is it? It is your identity.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So listen to a story here.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9

Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: These two are very good friends.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: They just don't share their lunch.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And the rest are very good friends.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: In the matter of food, he is not one.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And he is a friend in all other matters.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And here you can see that this is John and Harry.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Both of them have their own Aadhar ID.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So this is my Aadhar number.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And John's Aadhar number looks something like this.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So this is John's Aadhar number.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: And this is my Aadhar number.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Our Aadhar numbers can never be the same.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Or if you assume that our friend is made.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Tanya and John's friend is made.

Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So their Aadhar numbers will also be different.

Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So John and Harry were friends.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9

Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: If I told you any of these Aadhar numbers.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9

Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: Then you will understand that we are talking about Tanya.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9
chunks.text: So this Aadhar number uniquely identifies Tanya,

Id & Classes in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #9

text: In this video, I will tell you what are ID and Classes? The concept of ID and Classes is one of the most confused concepts. In fact, when I was learning HTML, I was very confused in my early days. ID means Unique Identifier. That is, if you give an ID to an element, you will not give that ID to the other element. But Class means that if you want to give a property to multiple elements, then you will give it multiple classes. For example, you can give a class named Red to a div and a form. Similarly, you can give a class named BGRed to an article tag and a header tag. Do like this video because we will now go to the computer screen and we will see these things very closely.
